uniV3SwapExactInput(uint256,bytes,addres.details: To Use Uni swap with ETH, the ETH must be wrapped before calling it

params.amountIn: The amount of input tokens for the trade
params.path: The path of the trade as a bytes string abi.encodePacked in this order [token-factory-fee(uint24)-token(-factory-fee(uint24)-token)]
params.payer: The address that will be paying the input
params.recipient: The recipient of the output tokens

returns.amountOut: The amount of output tokens for the trade

params.amount0Delta: The amount change of token0 from the view of pool side
params.amount1Delta: The amount change of token1 from the view of pool side
params.data: The path of the trade as a bytes

uniV3GetTicks(address,int24).notice: Get uniV3 pool tick info using pool address and tick range

uniV3PoolParams(address).notice: Get uniV3 pool param info using pool address

uniV3PoolState(address).notice: Get uniV3 pool state info using pool address

uniV3SwapExactInput(uint256,bytes,addres.notice: Performs a Uniswap v3 exact input swap

uniswapV3SwapCallback(int256,int256,byte.notice: Performs a callback function of uniswapV3 pool

documentation.text:
@dev Used as the placeholder value for maxAmountIn, because the computed amount in for an exact output swap
 can never actually be this value
@dev Transient storage variable used for checking slippage
@dev The minimum value that can be returned from #getSqrtRatioAtTick. Equivalent to getSqrtRatioAtTick(MIN_TICK)
@dev The maximum value that can be returned from #getSqrtRatioAtTick. Equivalent to getSqrtRatioAtTick(MAX_TICK)
@notice Get uniV3 pool param info using pool address
@notice Get uniV3 pool state info using pool address

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (uint256) pure returns (struct IUniswapV3Viewer.Tick memory[] memory)

documentation.text: @notice Get uniV3 pool tick info using pool address and tick range
@dev swap callback function for uniswapV3 and pancakeV3

@dev Performs a single swap for both exactIn and exactOut
 For exactIn, `amount` is `amountIn`. For exactOut, `amount` is `-amountOut`
